This game is amazing, for newcomers or old veterans of gaming. This game is heavily skill and knowledge based, so if you want to get better, you need to be dedicated and spend time learning the basics and call-outs. Here are some pros and cons about this game for newcomers.

Pros:
- Amazing Community
- Great Learning Ressources
- Fun
- Pretty Easy To Learn The Basics
- Great With Friends
- Works Fine On Potato PCs and Macs
- Great Game Overall
Cons:
- Some People Can Be Toxic
- Harder To Learn And Experience Once You've Finished The Basics
- Really Encouraging To Spend Money On Cosmetics
- Many Cheaters If You Don't Own Prime Status

And That's It, Other Than That This Game Is Amazing And I 100% Recommend It.
